price: Unabagezeho (yewe Muhamadi) inkuru y’umwe (mu bayisiraheli) twahaye ibimenyetso byacu (ubumenyi) maze akabyisohoramo (akabihakana), nuko Shitani ikamukurikira (ikamuyobya), bityo aba abaye mu bayobye.
arabic: وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنۡهَا فَأَتۡبَعَهُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'lu ʿalayhim naba-a alladhī ātaynāhu āyātinā fa-insalakha min'hā fa-atbaʿahu al-shayṭānu fakāna mina al-ghāwīna
